queries.description: Basic From table
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1}

queries.description: Basic From table with Alias
queries.sql: SELECT a.num, a.name FROM {tbl1} AS a

queries.description: INNER JOIN
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} INNER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.num = {tbl2}.num

queries.description: LEFT OUTER JOIN
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} LEFT OUTER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.num = {tbl2}.num

queries.description: LEFT OUTER JOIN with non-join related clause
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} LEFT OUTER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.num = {tbl2}.num AND {tbl2}.val = 'xxx'

queries.description: LEFT OUTER JOIN with inequality condition
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl1}.num, {tbl2}.num, {tbl1}.name, {tbl2}.val FROM {tbl2} LEFT OUTER JOIN {tbl1} ON {tbl1}.num = {tbl2}.num AND {tbl1}.name != {tbl2}.val

queries.description: LEFT OUTER JOIN with inequality condition
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl1}.num, {tbl2}.num, {tbl1}.name, {tbl2}.val FROM {tbl2} LEFT OUTER JOIN {tbl1} ON {tbl1}.name = {tbl2}.val AND {tbl1}.num > {tbl2}.num + 1

queries.description: CROSS JOIN
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} CROSS JOIN {tbl2}

queries.comments: select all doesn't work because h2 output the rows in different order from Pinot and test framework doesn't consider the column order for rows and blindly assume they are in the same order
queries.description: RIGHT OUTER JOIN
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl1}.num, {tbl1}.name, {tbl2}.num, {tbl2}.val FROM {tbl1} RIGHT OUTER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.num = {tbl2}.num

queries.description: RIGHT OUTER JOIN output rows in different order than join order
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl2}.num, {tbl2}.val, {tbl1}.num, {tbl1}.name FROM {tbl1} RIGHT OUTER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.num = {tbl2}.num

queries.description: RIGHT OUTER JOIN output rows in mixed table order
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl1}.num, {tbl2}.num, {tbl1}.name, {tbl2}.val FROM {tbl1} RIGHT OUTER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.num = {tbl2}.num

queries.description: RIGHT OUTER JOIN with inequality condition
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl1}.num, {tbl2}.num, {tbl1}.name, {tbl2}.val FROM {tbl1} RIGHT OUTER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.num = {tbl2}.num AND {tbl1}.name != {tbl2}.val

queries.description: RIGHT OUTER JOIN with inequality condition
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl1}.num, {tbl2}.num, {tbl1}.name, {tbl2}.val FROM {tbl1} RIGHT OUTER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.name = {tbl2}.val AND {tbl1}.num > {tbl2}.num + 1

queries.description: NATURAL JOIN
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} NATURAL JOIN {tbl2}

queries.description: JOIN with table alias
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} a LEFT JOIN {tbl2} b ON a.num = b.num

queries.description: self JOIN with table alias
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} AS a INNER JOIN {tbl1} AS b ON a.num = b.num

queries.description: table alias on one side only using star
queries.sql: SELECT a.* FROM {tbl1} AS a JOIN {tbl2} AS b ON a.num = b.num

queries.description: sub-query to semi-join syntax with star results, using IN clause
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} WHERE num IN (SELECT num FROM {tbl2})

queries.description: sub-query to semi-join syntax with star results, using IN clause multiple times
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} WHERE num IN (SELECT num FROM {tbl2}) AND name IN (SELECT val FROM {tbl2} WHERE num = 3)

queries.description: sub-query to semi-join syntax with star results, using IN clause multiple times with grouping
queries.sql: SELECT num, COUNT(*) FROM {tbl1} WHERE num IN (SELECT num FROM {tbl2}) AND name IN (SELECT val FROM {tbl2} WHERE num = 3) GROUP BY num

queries.description: sub-query to multiple anti semi-join queries with star results, using NOT IN clause
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} WHERE (num > -10 and num < 10) AND (name NOT IN (SELECT val FROM {tbl2} WHERE num = 3)) AND (name NOT IN (SELECT val from {tbl2} WHERE num = 4))

queries.description: sub-query with range predicates
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} WHERE (num > -10 and num < 10) AND (name NOT IN (SELECT val FROM {tbl2} WHERE num > -100 and num < 5))

queries.description: join with range predicates on both sides of the join
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} AS A, {tbl2} AS B WHERE (A.num > 10 AND B.num < 20)

queries.description: join with range predicate disjunction
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} AS A, {tbl2} AS B WHERE A.num > 10 OR B.num < 20

queries.description: join query with mix of range predicate disjunction/conjunction
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} AS A, {tbl2} AS B WHERE (A.num > 10 AND B.num < 20) OR (A.num < 10 AND B.num < 10)

queries.description: sub-query to semi-join syntax with star results, using single val predicate clause
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} WHERE num < (SELECT SUM(num) FROM {tbl2})

queries.description: sub-query used as one side of the join condition
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT num AS id, name FROM {tbl1} WHERE name != 'c') AS a JOIN {tbl2} AS b ON a.id = b.num

queries.description: FULL OUTER JOIN
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl1}.num, {tbl1}.name, {tbl2}.num, {tbl2}.val FROM {tbl1} FULL JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.num = {tbl2}.num

queries.description: FULL OUTER JOIN with left table empty
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl_empty}.strCol1, {tbl_empty}.intCol1, {tbl_empty}.strCol2, {tbl2}.num, {tbl2}.val FROM {tbl_empty} FULL JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl_empty}.intCol1 = {tbl2}.num

queries.description: FULL OUTER JOIN with right table empty
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl_empty}.strCol1, {tbl_empty}.intCol1, {tbl_empty}.strCol2, {tbl2}.num, {tbl2}.val FROM {tbl2} FULL JOIN {tbl_empty} ON {tbl_empty}.intCol1 = {tbl2}.num

queries.description: FULL OUTER JOIN with inequality condition
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl1}.num, {tbl2}.num, {tbl1}.name, {tbl2}.val FROM {tbl1} FULL OUTER JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.num = {tbl2}.num AND {tbl1}.name != {tbl2}.val

queries.description: FULL OUTER JOIN with both tables empty
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl_empty}.strCol1, {tbl_empty}.intCol1, {tbl_empty}.strCol2, {tbl_empty2}.strCol1, {tbl_empty2}.intCol1, {tbl_empty2}.strCol2 FROM {tbl_empty} FULL JOIN {tbl_empty2} ON {tbl_empty}.intCol1 = {tbl_empty2}.intCol1

queries.description: join without condition
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1}, {tbl2}

queries.description: join with functional results
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} ON MOD({tbl1}.intCol1, 2) = MOD({tbl2}.intCol1, 3)

queries.description: join with multiple columns and mixed types
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1 AND {tbl1}.intCol1 = {tbl2}.intCol1 AND {tbl1}.intCol1 = {tbl2}.doubleCol1

queries.description: join with mixed equality and inequality conditions
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1}, {tbl2} WHERE {tbl2}.doubleCol1 > {tbl1}.intCol1 AND (({tbl1}.strCol1 <> 'foo' AND {tbl2}.intCol1 <> 2) OR ({tbl1}.strCol1 <> 'bar' AND {tbl2}.doubleCol1 > 3))

queries.description: join with multiple join keys, with star results
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1 AND {tbl1}.intCol1 = {tbl2}.intCol1

queries.description: join with multiple join keys, reused references on one side, with star results
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1 AND {tbl2}.strCol1 = {tbl1}.strCol2

queries.description: join with where clause
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1 WHERE {tbl2}.doubleCol1 > 2 AND {tbl1}.intCol1 > 1

queries.description: join with where clause conditions on both table to be pulled up
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1}, {tbl2} WHERE {tbl2}.doubleCol1 > 2 AND {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1 AND {tbl1}.intCol1 > 1

queries.description: join with where clause conditions on both table that involves or clause should translate to inequality join
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1 WHERE {tbl1}.strCol2 = 'alice' OR ({tbl1}.intCol1 > 1 AND {tbl2}.doubleCol1 > 2)

queries.description: join with mixed equality and inequality conditions
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1 AND {tbl1}.intCol1 > {tbl2}.doubleCol1

queries.description: join with push-down filter pass lower aggregate
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT {tbl1}.strCol1, SUM({tbl1}.intCol1) FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1 WHERE {tbl2}.intCol1 > {tbl2}.doubleCol1 GROUP BY 1) WHERE strCol1 NOT IN ('bar', 'alice')

queries.description: semi-join with push-down filter pass lower aggregate
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT {tbl1}.strCol1, SUM({tbl1}.intCol1) FROM {tbl1} WHERE {tbl1}.strCol1 IN (SELECT {tbl2}.strCol1 FROM {tbl2} WHERE {tbl2}.intCol1 > {tbl2}.doubleCol1) GROUP BY 1) WHERE strCol1 NOT IN ('bar', 'alice')

queries.description: join with push-down filter pass lower aggregate with having filter
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT {tbl1}.strCol1, SUM({tbl1}.intCol1) FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl2}.strCol1 WHERE {tbl2}.intCol1 > {tbl2}.doubleCol1 GROUP BY 1 HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) WHERE strCol1 NOT IN ('bar', 'alice')

queries.description: semi-join with push-down filter pass lower aggregate with having filter
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT {tbl1}.strCol1, SUM({tbl1}.intCol1) FROM {tbl1} WHERE {tbl1}.strCol1 IN (SELECT {tbl2}.strCol1 FROM {tbl2} WHERE {tbl2}.intCol1 > {tbl2}.doubleCol1) GROUP BY 1 HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) WHERE strCol1 NOT IN ('bar', 'alice')

queries.description: nested query with push-down filter pass inner aggregate
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT {tbl1}.strCol1, SUM({tbl1}.intCol1) FROM {tbl1} GROUP BY {tbl1}.strCol1 HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) WHERE strCol1 NOT IN ('bar', 'alice')

queries.description: join 3 tables, mixed join conditions
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl2} ON {tbl1}.intCol1 > {tbl2}.doubleCol1 JOIN {tbl3} ON {tbl1}.strCol1 = {tbl3}.strCol2

queries.description: join with an empty right table
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} JOIN {tbl_empty} ON {tbl1}.intCol1 = {tbl_empty}.intCol1

queries.description: join with an empty right table using LEFT OUTER
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl1} LEFT JOIN {tbl_empty} ON {tbl1}.intCol1 = {tbl_empty}.intCol1

queries.description: join with an empty left table
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl_empty} JOIN {tbl1} ON {tbl1}.intCol1 = {tbl_empty}.intCol1

queries.description: join with an empty left table using LEFT OUTER
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl_empty} LEFT JOIN {tbl1} ON {tbl1}.intCol1 = {tbl_empty}.intCol1

queries.description: join with an empty right table using RIGHT OUTER
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl1}.strCol1, {tbl1}.intCol1, {tbl1}.strCol2, {tbl_empty}.strCol1, {tbl_empty}.intCol1, {tbl_empty}.strCol2 FROM {tbl1} RIGHT JOIN {tbl_empty} ON {tbl1}.intCol1 = {tbl_empty}.intCol1

queries.description: join with an empty left table using RIGHT OUTER
queries.sql: SELECT {tbl1}.strCol1, {tbl1}.intCol1, {tbl1}.strCol2, {tbl_empty}.strCol1, {tbl_empty}.intCol1, {tbl_empty}.strCol2 FROM {tbl_empty} RIGHT JOIN {tbl1}  ON {tbl1}.intCol1 = {tbl_empty}.intCol1

queries.description: join with both left and right empty table using RIGHT OUTER
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM {tbl_empty} as a RIGHT JOIN {tbl_empty} as b ON a.intCol1 = b.intCol1
